channel.title: Velreth on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Velreth on Chaotic Online

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Over-Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good vs. Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: Tale of Two Toms
item.description: In this episode an easy-going version of our protagonist comes into play and, thanks to an evil pushing, ends up in a fight, in the best Chaotic style

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?
